meanings.definition: Formed into a compact brick shape.
meanings.sent1: The briquetted coal was easy to stack neatly.
meanings.sent2: The briquetted paper was perfect for starting the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The briquetted chocolate bar looked like a tiny, delicious brick.
meanings.sent4: Her briquetted hair held the style perfectly all day.
meanings.sent5: The briquetted snowball was so dense, it didn't break when thrown.
